headline: 3 Stocks to Sell on an Escalating Trade War
summary: Last week, InvestorPlace Senior Analyst Louis Navellier decided to sell GigaCloud Technology Inc. (GCT) from his Accelerated Profits portfolio. At first glance, the move seems surprising – like watching a chef throw out a perfectly cooked steak. GigaCloud was a fast-growing tech firm with a sizzling 30%-plus rate of return. Revenue surged 65% last year, and net profits rose to $125 million – a sixfold increase from two years before However, GigaCloud specializes in large parcel shipping. It uses
